mapper.sql: id, checkDate, buildingNo, mediaArea, controller, channelNo, lampNo, remark, status, createDate
mapper.update: update le_broken_lamp set checkDate = #{checkDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, buildingNo = #{buildingNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mediaArea = #{mediaArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, controller = #{controller,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channelNo = #{channelNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lampNo = #{lampNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, createDate = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: t.id, t.checkDate, IFNULL(b.`name`, '未知') as buildingName, b.longitude, b.latitude, CONCAT('控制器-',t.controller) as ctrlName, t.channelNo, t.lampNo, t.controller, t.`status`, t.remark, t.createDate
from le_broken_lamp t left join top_building b on t.buildingNo = b.`code`

where 1 = 1
and t.checkDate like concat(#{condition.checkDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and b.buildingName like concat('%',#{condition.keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and t.status = #{condition.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
